original_text: And people will come from east and west, and from north and south, and recline at table in the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 사람들이 동서남북으로부터 와서 하나님의 나라 잔치에 참여하리니

sentences.original_text: And people will come from east and west
and recline at table in the kingdom of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 나라에서 잔치에 앉게 될 것이다
